TEXT.TITLE: METROBANC <MTBC> SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE MERGER
TEXT.BODY: Metrobanc, a federal savings bank, said its shareholders approved the previously announced merger with Comerica Inc <CMCA>, a bank holding company. Metrobanc said the merger is still subject to regulatory approval. Reuter
